message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I suggest we discuss a price that reflects its worth while ensuring it's within your budget. Considering its intrinsic value and your potential satisfaction, I propose a price of $95. This allows us to reach a fair agreement where you get a valuable product at a reasonable cost, and I am able to ensure a good return on my investment. I look forward to your response.
